content: royal mile cowl bulky version materials 106 yards magpie swish bulky short version 1 skein beauregarde long version 2 skeins fior di latte gauge 11sts / 14 row in pattern abbreviations needles k knit us size 13 9mm 16 circular short p purl us size 13 9mm 24 circular long notions stitch marker tapestry needle www magpiefibers com all images text and illustration © magpie fibers 2015 instructions cast on 64 120 stitches place marker and join for working in the round *k2 p2* repeat to end of round repeat for 3 rounds for a total of 4 rounds body pattern round 1 and 2 *p2 k2* round 3 and 4 *k2 p2* repeat this 4 round pattern 7 times repeat round 1 and 2 one more time finishing *k2 p2* repeat to end of round repeat for 3 rounds for a total of 4 rounds bind off loosely weave in ends block www magpiefibers com all images text and illustration © magpie fibers 2015
